channel.title: Help with player login message code please
channel.description:
Ok so i need help with a code that says a player has logged in. I only have like owner this logged in,co-owner that logged in,donator him logged in,etc. for those who are donator+. But i need a code for when a regular player logs in,can i get a coding for that please? THX! :)
EDIT: When i mean by this is like,when a regular new/whatevs player logs in,everyone can see in the chatbox that "[player name] has logged in]". Something like that. Help me get a code for that please?:)
EDIT: NVM lol,I just made my own code for it...Srry,i really am srry,i feel this is just a worthless thread. You can delete please! THX! :)

item.title: Help with player login message code please
item.dc:creator: @miller4 miller4
item.description:
@miller4 wrote:

Glad you found it :3

Read full topic
item.source: Help with player login message code please

item.title: Help with player login message code please
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

Since you need it, it looks like this

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""+ Config.OWNER +"")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; getDH().sendDialogues(28, npcType); c2.sendMessage("<col=63487><shad=4980991><img=3> [Main-Owner] <img=3> [owner name] has just logged in."); } } }

And if you want to know if the players logged in,it looks like thsi

f (playerRights == 0) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; getDH().sendDialogues(28, npcType); c2.sendMessage("<img=7> [Player] <img=7> " +playerName+ " has just logged in."); } } }

You could find this in the “Client.java”

Read full topic
item.source: Help with player login message code please
